name: boringcache-action
description: Portable build cache for GitHub Actions. Cache once, reuse anywhere. 3x faster than actions/cache.

scripts.build: tsc && ncc build lib/restore.ts -o dist/restore && ncc build lib/save.ts -o dist/save && ncc build lib/restore-only.ts -o dist/restore-only && ncc build lib/save-only.ts -o dist/save-only
scripts.package: ncc build lib/restore.ts -o dist/restore && ncc build lib/save.ts -o dist/save && ncc build lib/restore-only.ts -o dist/restore-only && ncc build lib/save-only.ts -o dist/save-only

author: BoringCache
